name: Prada Luna Rossa
description: An invigorating and aromatic fragrance with notes of lavender, orange, and amber.

name: Givenchy Gentleman
description: A sophisticated and masculine scent with a blend of pear, iris, and leather.

name: Yves Saint Laurent Mon Paris
description: A passionate and floral fragrance with a mix of strawberry, jasmine, and patchouli.

name: Chanel Coco Mademoiselle
description: A timeless and elegant fragrance with notes of orange, jasmine, and patchouli.

name: Dior Sauvage
description: A fresh and woody scent with hints of bergamot, pepper, and ambroxan.

name: Gucci Bloom
description: A vibrant and floral fragrance with a blend of tuberose, jasmine, and Rangoon creeper.

name: Marc Jacobs Daisy
description: A youthful and fresh fragrance with notes of strawberry, violet, and musk.

name: Tom Ford Black Orchid
description: A sensual and luxurious scent with a blend of black truffle, ylang-ylang, and vanilla.

name: Versace Bright Crystal
description: A refreshing and floral fragrance with hints of pomegranate, peony, and musk.
